Articles.Content:
I would like to know what everyone is going to (try to) do when KSP 2 comes out, I know that me and my friends are going to host a server where we compete for the galaxy in a Star Wars like situation. My friend has fittingly named his space agency altera tech and I have named mine bashed aerospace. My ultimate goal is to make a station stabilized  in between rask and rusk. How about you?

Edited September 2, 2021 by Awfulwaffle

27 minutes ago, Awfulwaffle said:

host a server where we compete for the galaxy in a Star Wars like situation.

I do that all the time with my friends... In Stellaris, I can't even begin to immagine how terrible it would be to play like that in Kerbal.

On my part I think that we'll start a traditional space race kind of server competing on the "firsts" while collaborating on the infrastructure building.

If there is an atmospheric fusion engine, I think I have a design for a 4 (or 5) part interstellar ssto, I've never done a low anything challenge yet, but I think this could work.  

On a more serious note, first goal: orbital workshop, I hate launching to orbit, love landin' though.  

second: First colony has to be on Duna.  

Note: one of my ships will have to be called the red october, and another The Redneck

Ive been thinking for a while of making an anarchy career server where there are no rules. Mostly to generate conflicts and a player driven economy, Plus who wouldn't want to fire missiles onto other spacecraft >:). 

1 hour ago, Awfulwaffle said:

I would like to know what everyone is going to (try to) do when KSP 2 comes out, I know that me and my friends are going to host a server where we compete for the galaxy in a Star Wars like situation. My friend has fittingly named his space agency altera tech and I have named mine bashed aerospace. My ultimate goal is to make a station stabilized  in between rask and rusk. How about you?

Sounds cool, If your willing too I would love to join, CASO has had planes on arming their shuttles for a while.

2 hours ago, BuranAce said:
4 hours ago, Awfulwaffle said:

 

Sounds cool, If your willing too I would love to join, CASO has had planes on arming their shuttles for a while

If public servers are a thing then id be happy for you to join us

 

3 hours ago, Master39 said:

competing on the "firsts" while collaborating on the infrastructure building.

Sounds fun, me and my friends have decided that we will have bases/stations around the solar systems that will be designated as a neutral conflict free zone

1st thing I'm gunna do is grief all your servers >:D

DEORBIT ALL TEH SATELLITES! MWAHAHAHAHA!!!

But for real I'm probably gunna find other servers and hang with y'all and see whats up....
Roleplay different games and movies, interstellar, subnautica, wars etc, with my brother.
